review: I love this little stick. I am able to move it easily from one TV to another. One of my TVs has a box for HBO, so I can use the Amazon Fire TV Stick to watch Netflix when I am in the room with that TV. In another room, Netflix is available on the TV; when I want to watch HBO in that room, I simply use the Amazon Fire TV Stick. Great little stick!
